TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CipherReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class CipherReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 表示 XML 加密中的 項目。

span.span: Represents the element in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表``中 XML 加密項目。This class represents the `` element in XML encryption. 它會識別為來源，處理時，會產生加密的資料。It identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data. 實際加密所參考的資料``透過下列程序。The actual encrypted data referenced by the `` is obtained by the following process. ` URI`屬性包含統一資源識別元 (URI) 是取值。The ` URI` property contains a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that is dereferenced. 如果``項目也會包含轉換鏈結、 取值 URI 所產生的資料會轉換依指定產生的加密的資料。If the `` element also contains a transform chain, the data resulting from dereferencing the URI is transformed as specified to produce the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密的資料是 base64 編碼的 XML 文件中，轉換會指定 XPath 運算式後面接著 base64 解碼，因此可以擷取加密的資料。For example, if the encrypted data is base64-encoded within an XML document, the transforms would specify an XPath expression followed by a base64 decoding so the encrypted data can be extracted. 相似的 XML 數位簽章 URI 和轉換的語法。The syntax of the URI and transforms is similar to that of XML digital signatures. 不過，在 XML 數位簽章產生和驗證處理啟動使用相同的來源資料，以相同的順序執行該轉換。However, in XML digital signatures, both generation and validation processing start with the same source data and perform that transform in the same order. XML 加密中解密的應用程式已加密的資料和指定的轉換。In XML encryption, the decrypting application has only the encrypted data and the specified transforms. 轉型會列舉取得加密的資料所需的順序。The transforms are enumerated in the order necessary to obtain the encrypted data. **請注意**根據預設，您無法取值 （dereference) 加密從不明來源，例如網站、 從檔案的文件的參考因為屬性是**null**。**Note** By default, you cannot dereference cipher references from documents with unknown sources, such as files from a Web site, because the property is **null**. 例如，當您嘗試解密檔案，包含``參考網站上的檔案項目擲回，即使該要求由完全信任組件。For example, when you attempt to decrypt a file containing a `` element that references a file on the Web, a is thrown, even if the request is made by a fully trusted assembly. 如果您確定要解密的文件可信任，您可以使用下列程式碼變更完全受信任的應用程式的這個行為：If you are sure the documents you are decrypting can be trusted, you can change this behavior for fully trusted applications by using the following code: ``` Evidence ev = new Evidence(); ev.AddHost (new Zone(SecurityZone.MyComputer)); EncryptedXml exml = new EncryptedXml(doc, ev); ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立提供參考資訊的物件物件。This constructor creates a object that provides reference information for a object. 參考資訊提供加密資料的位置。The reference information provides the location of the encrypted data.

summary.span: 利用指定的統一資源識別元 (URI)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立物件使用統一資源識別元 (URI) 所加密的資料點。This constructor creates a object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the encrypted data. 物件會被用來提供參考資訊物件。The object is then used to provide reference information for a object. 您可以使用 URI 來指定包含加密的資料的 XML 檔案。You can use a URI to designate an XML file containing encrypted data. 例如: For example: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml";` 您也可以使用部分的 URI，指定只包含 XML 文件的一部分是要加密。You can also use a partial URI to designate that only a portion of an XML document is to be encrypted. 例如，假設名為 document.xml XML 文件包含兩個`MyForm`項目，如下列 XML 程式碼範例所示：For example, assume that an XML document named document.xml contains two `MyForm` elements as shown in the following XML code example: `` `` `` `` `` `` 您可以加密的內容中`Form2`使用像是下列的 URI:You can encrypt only the content in `Form2` using a URI such as the following: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml#Form2";` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]
